items.name: Wireless Headphones
items.description: High-quality wireless headphones with noise-cancelling technology and up to 20 hours of battery life.

items.name: Stainless Steel Water Bottle
items.description: Durable, eco-friendly water bottle made of double-walled stainless steel that keeps drinks cold for up to 24 hours.

items.name: Programmable Thermostat
items.description: Smart thermostat that allows you to control your home's temperature remotely and create custom schedules for energy savings.

items.name: Outdoor Camping Tent
items.description: Spacious, weatherproof tent with a lightweight aluminum frame and easy setup for comfortable camping trips.

items.name: Automatic Coffee Maker
items.description: Programmable coffee machine that brews fresh, hot coffee at the touch of a button or on a schedule.
